item.title: How to Minimize the Microsoft Windows Clock (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Minimize the Microsoft Windows Clock: With Click With Menu With Right Click No time to scroll down? Click through this presentation tutorial: See a tutorial video: How to Minimize the Microsoft Windows Clock With Click Step 1: First open Windows Clock. In the upper right corner, click the “Minimize” or “-” button. How to Minimize the Microsoft Windows Clock With Menu Step 1: Open Windows Clock.
